channel.title: Changing colors
channel.description: HOw do i add a color mask, or change the color of items. In a few servers, i see that they have like 12 abyssal whips, and each of them are a different color like, red and gree, blue and white, etc. so how would i make Multiples of items, and have those items be different colors?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 07, 2007, 06:36:49 AM[/size][hr]could anyone help me?
